articles.title: Quentin Grimes making good on wild-card status by transforming Knicks on both ends - New York Post
articles.description: Grimes poured in 23 points on 8-for-11 shooting (5 out of 7 from 3), he played superb defense and often made life difficult for Trae Young.
articles.content: There were no apologies necessary. The Hawks were missing two regulars, then lost Dejounte Murray four minutes into the game. They were hurt, and they were short, and that catches up to a team, and s… [+4216 chars]

articles.author: , The Tennessean
articles.title: What Tennessee Titans coach Mike Vrabel said on A.J. Brown trade after GM Jon Robinson's firing - Tennessean
articles.description: After the Tennessee Titans fired GM Jon Robinson, coach Mike Vrabel shared his feelings on Robinson's choice to trade Pro Bowl WR A.J. Brown in April.
